channel.title: c9 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in c9 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Cloud 9 is pretty great
item.description: 10:34 Saturday 17 December 2016 JST I’m going through a Ruby on Rails tutorial which suggests using Cloud 9. It’s pretty amazing that this is available free of charge. It gives me unlimited public workspaces where I have a unix shell, ability to run all sorts of applications. The ones I care about now rails, git, emacs.. yay! 12:49 Saturday 17 December 2016 JST After creating a pull request to fix hello_world Gemfile, my app is running on https://shrouded-everglades-38559.

item.title: Cloud 9 is amazing!
item.description: ##12:51 Wednesday 26 November 2014 JST## ”“‘;;;;;;;;;;;; Sorry, that was Ted walking on my computer. Cloud 9 is amazing! How can they implement SublimeText in a browser? I can run emacs! It’s like I’m working in a local shell.. So brilliant! There’s a .bash_aliases file, .bashrc so I can set up aliases and stuff. Wow. I’d like the pricepoint to be a bit lower, but dang it’s pretty close to amazing.
